attributes.action: Assist innovations for hard to heat homes particularly solid wall insulation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Their are 7 million solidwall properties in the uk all wasting energy,and adding to the co2 emissions problem,EACH M2 installed can save 1 tonne of co2,we all recognise renewables are important, and energy efficient heating systems, but we must put in place, saving the energy first,
When new innovative ideas are brought to market with the help of organisations such as NESTA they should be given every opportunity to succeed otherwise what is the point of trying to help innovations. We have battled to bring the plight of the fuel poor and solid wall insulation to the forefront  Where are the incentives and the help for the up and coming innovative companies that can bring changes and make a difference to the environment?
